description_html: This beautifully modulated ombré has been rendered in an abstract scale pattern that suggests a handsome fish swimming through clear water. Each of the textile’s seven colors captures the subtle beauty of a brook trout and shimmers in the light. The fabric is made of 100% solution dyed polyolefin and is fade, stain, UV, and mildew resistant. At 50,000 double rubs, this durable, woven fabric can be utilized for residential, hospitality or commercial applications indoors or out.
